column1: SDG 4.4 By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship
Definition: Average number of years of education received by people ages 25 and older, converted from educational attainment levels using official durations of each level.
Source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2020), Barro and Lee (2018), ICF Macro Demographic and Health Surveys, UNICEF Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys and OECD (2019b).

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Based on projections from Barro and Lee (2018).
b: Data refer to 2019 or the most recent year available.
c: Updated by HDRO based on data from ICF Macro Demographic and Health Surveys for 2006-2019.
d: Updated by HDRO based on data from United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys for 2006–2019.
e: Based on data from OECD (2019b).
f: Updated by HDRO using projections from Barro and Lee (2018).
g: Updated by HDRO based on data from Eurostat (2019).
h: Updated by HDRO based on data from UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2020).
j: Based on data from the national statistical office.
